CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Should the SKU be visible to Sales reps? PMs may choose to restrict this SKU for beta or Early Access products with limited availability to avoid SKU getting added to too many opportunities once launched.
If this box is checked, Business System - GTM knows to configure SKU with a product approval step in CPQ. This allows PMs to approve every quote created with this SKU.
CustomField.label: Product Approval Required
